relapse: I'm falling back into your arms again, no escape, no pretend.
memories: All these memories keep flooding back, can't let go, it's just like that.
lost in time: Drifting away, lost in time, echoes of you still on my mind.
broken promises: All the words you said, they fade away, broken promises still replay.
forever yours: No matter where we go, I'm forever yours, through highs and lows.
what if: Kasi what if            what if sayang lng naman talaga oras mo       yung tao mahal mo         yung taong pinahahalagahan mo       bakit nasan na ba siya ngayon           nasan na siya           yung nagsabi sayo na mags-stay  yung nagsasabi sayo yung nagsabi sayo na    ano man mangyari nandyan sa tabi mo     bakit ganon bakit nasa tabi na ng iba
question: Ano gagawin mo             kapag yung taong gusto mo                sayo pa talaga kinukwento                  yung taong gusto nya
back to friends: how can we go                      back to being friends                           when we just shared a bed                                                         how can you look                          at me and pretend                          i'm someone you've  never met
